-| wb(w1, wral(s0, c0, wfun(cv(s0))))
-| wceq(c1, cin(cdm(cv(s0)), cdm(cv(s1))))
-| wb(w0, wa(w1, wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wceq(cres(cv(s0), c1), cres(cv(s1), c1))))))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s2), c0), wal(s0, wcel(cv(s2), c0)))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffss(s0, s2)
-| diffss(s1, s2)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsc(s2, c0)

comment: First-order logic and set theory. (Contributed by Jonathan Ben-Naim, 3-Jun-2011.) (New usage is discouraged.)
